payload.description: Create SwipeableBlock.jsx component using framer-motion for swipe-to-delete animations. Should use useSwipeGesture hook (already created), reveal red delete zone on swipe left, spring animation back if not past threshold. Props: onDelete, deleteThreshold (default 160), disabled.
payload.context: Uses framer-motion v12.23.22 (already installed). Should show red delete zone with trash icon when swiped left. Delete zone width should match swipe offset. Include haptic feedback at thresholds using haptics utility.
